title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       There are no entrance fees at Cumberland Gap National Historical Park. There are fees for camping, guided tours, and other amenities in the park.         Gap Cave Tours Adults: $8.00 Seniors with Interagency Senior Pass: $4.00 Children ages 5 - 12: $4.00         Hensley Settlement Tour Adults: $10.00 Seniors with Interagency Senior Pass: $5.00 Children 12 and under: $5.00      Wilderness Road campground The developed campgorund has 120 sites, 41 of which have electrical hookup. Heated restrooms with complimentary showers are found throughout the campground. Sites are available on a first come, first served basis. Sites with electric: $20.00 per night, $10.00 per night with Interagency Senior or Access Pass Sites without electricity: $14.00 per night, $7.00 with Senior or Access Pass       America the Beautiful Interagency Pass Program
